Package me.aecsocket.calibre.util.itemuser

Interface ItemUser

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityItemUser, GunItemUser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LivingEntityItemUser, PlayerItemUser
    public interface ItemUser
    Represents an object which can use an ItemStack in some capacity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets an ItemUser from an object user, using default implementations.

      void startAnimation​(Animation animation, org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot)
      Starts an animation for this user.

      • ofDefault

        static ItemUser ofDefault​(CalibrePlugin plugin,
                          Object user)
        Gets an ItemUser from an object user, using default implementations.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin.
        user - The user.
        Returns:
        The ItemUser version, or null if no available version was found.
